name: meditatively
content:

in a way that involves serious thought or study: When I walked into her hotel room, she was standing looking meditatively out of the window. He sat back in his chair and his face became meditatively blank.
More examplesFewer examplesThere was silence for a moment, while we all gazed meditatively at the floor.He drew in a mouthful of smoke, and let it out again slowly and meditatively.She stared out meditatively at the rain for a moment.
